omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		apc.NHSNumber, 
		apc.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate,
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
	from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
	where ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate is not null
		and apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select
		apc.NHSNumber, 
		apc.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate,
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
	from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
	where ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate is not null
		and apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `40760321`. Date of Referral

omopColumns.name: observation_date

dataSource.name: StartDateHospitalProviderSpell

omopColumns.name: observation_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.description: START DATE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the Start Date of the Hospital Provider Spell.

dataSource.name: StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell
dataSource.description: START TIME (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL)  is the Start Time  of the Hospital Provider Spell .

		apc.NHSNumber, 
		apc.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate,
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
	from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
	where ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate is not null
		and apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate
dataSource.description: The start date of a REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD .

origins.origin: REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD START DATE

		apc.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell,
		apc.ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate,
		apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
	from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
